/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the image. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the perspective. The image does not contain any discernible text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban landscape, with the trees providing a natural border to the street and the buildings maintaining a respectful distance. The image is a testament to the harmonious coexistence of nature and urban development in Beijing.
